entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Cochrane
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:11 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to plus 2 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Local blowing snow. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature rising to plus 2 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 9:20 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:20 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
